title: Fiddlesticks Lore Bug?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Not sure if I should've posted this in Report A Bug or Help & Support, but I was just browsing through the champion lore on the website, and Fiddlesticks only had this where his Lore should be.

replies.body:
I just checked my client and found I had no issue displaying his lore. I confirmed this by having a teammate do the same. I suspect yours may be missing due to a corruption in your game assets. I recommend [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5) of your League assets to see if it resolves the issue. 

Let me know if this helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=orrYE9ta,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-31T18:23:03.411+0000)
>
> I just checked my client and found I had no issue displaying his lore. I confirmed this by having a teammate do the same. I suspect yours may be missing due to a corruption in your game assets. I recommend [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5) of your League assets to see if it resolves the issue. 
> 
> Let me know if this helped.

Website, not client.  This was also promised to be looked at a month ago, but nothing yet.

Oh, my bad! I definitely misread that when I replied. I've gone ahead and reported the [problematic page](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/fiddlesticks/) to the correct team to address it. I'm not sure when they'll have a chance to investigate into this, but I've brought it to their attention nonetheless.
They're referring to the [website,](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/fiddlesticks/) not the client.
rofl the rioter didnt even fucking read the post what a joke
i am but its annoying when people simply dont read what the person said them claim something else
